xml.data:
Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 17 Maggārammaṇattika » 17.7 Pañhāvāra » 17.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 17.7.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Ārammaṇa
Maggārammaṇattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Ārammaṇa
28.
2500Maggahetuko dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—  ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, cetopariyañāṇena maggahetukacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānanti, maggahetukā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (1)
2501Maggahetuko dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—  ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti. (2)
2502Maggahetuko dhammo maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—  ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti. (3)
29.
2503Maggādhipati dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—  ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti. (1)
2504Maggādhipati dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—  ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, cetopariyañāṇena maggādhipaticittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānanti, maggādhipatī khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (2)
2505Maggādhipati dhammo maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—  ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti. (3)
30.
2506Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—  ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, cetopariyañāṇena maggahetukamaggādhipaticittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānanti, maggahetukā ca maggādhipatī ca khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (1)
2507Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggādhipatissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—  ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti. (2)
2508Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—  ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti. (3)
